title: Combined Welfare Administration Act of 1993
content: Combined Welfare Administration Act of 1993 - Authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make a combined grant to States for administrative costs necessary to carry out the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program under part A of title IV of the Social Security Act, the Medicaid program under title XIX of the Social Security Act, and the Food Stamp program. Eliminates enhanced Federal payments for State administrative activities under such programs. Provides for allotment and payment of funds under such grant program, as well as State reports on the intended use of such allotments. Sets forth audit requirements.
